nav.div: Brady Independent School District » News » What's New » SCHOOL CLOSURE UPDATE: 4/17/2020

div.div: Brady ISD SCHOOL CLOSURE UPDATE: APRIL 17, 2020

span.strong:
BRADY ISD
SCHOOL CLOSURE UPDATE: APRIL 17, 2020

br.br:
During a press conference today, Governor Greg Abbott announced that all Texas schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
Brady ISD administrators and teachers will continue to support our students through home-based instruction. We will also continue to provide our students with lunch and breakfast as needed. If you have any questions, please contact your child’s campus principal.

div.div: 1003 West 11th Street, Brady, TX 76825 | Phone 325-597-2301 | Fax 325-597-3984
